C

calculateDaysSailing(Route) - Method in class coreClasses.GameEnvironment
Calculates the days sailing for traveling to another Island on a paricular Route Takes the ceiling of distance/speed, as this will always create a number above 0 and not round down to 0
calculateDaysSailing(Route) - Method in class coreClasses.Ship
Calculates the number of days sailing on a particular route Rounds up to the ceiling of the route.getDistance() / speed to ensure that all routes have at least 1 days sailing.
calculateLiquidValue() - Method in class coreClasses.GameEnvironment
Calculates the current liquid value of a player in a game (the amount of money a player would have if they sold all items possible at your current island's store).
calculateScore() - Method in class coreClasses.GameEnvironment
Calculates a score by dividing profit by days played.
canBuyItemFromPlayer(Player, Item) - Static method in class coreClasses.Store
Checks if buying an item from a PLAYER TO A STORE is permissible if it is returns the string "Can buy" otherwise returns a string explaining why it cannot be done.
canSellItemToPlayer(GameEnvironment, Item) - Method in class coreClasses.Store
Checks if selling an item from a store is permissible.
canSellUpgradeToPlayer(GameEnvironment, Item) - Static method in class coreClasses.Store
Checks if a store can sell an upgrade to a player.
catalogueToArray(HashMap<String, HashMap<String, Integer>>) - Method in class coreClasses.Store
Converts a sell or buy catalogue into an an Array that can be easily displayed by cmd line UI
catalogueToNestedArray(HashMap<String, HashMap<String, Integer>>, String) - Method in class coreClasses.Store
Method to turn a catalogue into a nested array representation Used by GUI for displaying contents in tabular form
catalogueToString(HashMap<String, HashMap<String, Integer>>, String) - Method in class coreClasses.Store
Creates and returns a string representation of the given catalogue, useful for giving a quick overview of what a store buys or sells.
checkPlayerWantsToBuy(GameEnvironment, String, int) - Method in class coreClasses.Store
Method to check if a player wants to buy an item.
CheckValidInput - Class in coreClasses
General class to check for valid input across project

clearPanel(JPanel) - Method in class uiClasses.gui.Screen
Removes and refreshes all the components of a panel Useful for clearing a panel to prepare it for other uses

constructProbabilityMap(int, int, int) - Method in class coreClasses.Route
Takes probabilities (out of 100), and constructs the map that shows the probability of each RandomEvent.
